battleTraits.name: Quetzl the Preserver
battleTraits.lore: Quetzl grants protection from the dangers of the physical realms.
battleTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of melee weapons for attacks that target friendly **SERAPHON** units that are wholly within friendly territory.

battleTraits.name: Tepok the Seer
battleTraits.lore: The sign of Tepok, resplendent in the stars above, enlivens the land with thrumming geomantic energy.
battleTraits.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **SERAPHON** units.

battleTraits.name: The Great Plan
battleTraits.lore: The Seraphon look to the heavens for guidance, scrying the stars above in the hope that the Great Plan is revealed to them.
battleTraits.effect: That ****ASTERISM**** ability can be used for the rest of the battle, but the others cannot, unless allowed by the ‘Further the Great Plan’ ability.

battleTraits.name: Sotek the Deliverer
battleTraits.lore: The Asterism of Sotek emboldens the Seraphon with a war-hungry aggression.
battleTraits.effect: Add 2 to the **Move** characteristic of friendly **SERAPHON** units.

battleTraits.name: Itzl the Tamer
battleTraits.lore: Itzl is the most bestial of all the Old Ones and his asterism fills the Seraphon with ferocity.
battleTraits.effect: **Companion** weapons used by friendly **SERAPHON** units have **Crit (2 Hits)**.

battleTraits.name: Further the Great Plan
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Start of the Third Battle Round
battleTraits.lore: As the battle unfolds, so do the machinations of the Old Ones.
battleTraits.declare:
You can use this ability if you meet the condition below that corresponds to the ****ASTERISM**** you picked in the deployment phase.

***Itzl the Tamer:*** 3 or more enemy units have been destroyed.

***Quetzl the Preserver:*** There are no enemy units wholly within friendly territory.

***Sotek the Deliverer:*** The enemy general is in combat or has been destroyed.

***Tepok the Seer:*** There are any friendly ****SLANN**** units on the battlefield and no friendly ****SLANN**** units are in combat or have been destroyed.
battleTraits.effect: Pick a different ****ASTERISM**** ability. It can be used in addition to the one you picked in the deployment phase.

battleTraits.name: Beast of the Dark Jungles
battleTraits.lore: The perilous jungles of the Seraphon are the hunting grounds of the mighty Carnosaur, a reptilian titan that strikes fear and awe into the hearts of its enemies.
battleTraits.declare: Pick your general to use this ability if they are in combat.
battleTraits.effect:
Pick 1 of the following:

***Gargantuan Jaws:*** Pick an enemy unit in combat with your general and roll a dice. If the roll exceeds that unit’s Health characteristic, 1 model in that unit is slain.

***Roar:*** Pick an enemy unit in combat with your general. Subtract D6 from that unit’s control score this turn.

regimentAbilities.name: Predatory Fighters
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Phase, End of Any Turn
regimentAbilities.lore: These warriors bite bloody chunks of flesh from their foes in battle.
regimentAbilities.declare: Roll a dice for each enemy unit in combat with any friendly units.
regimentAbilities.effect: On a 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the unit being rolled for.

regimentAbilities.name: Temple-City Guardians
regimentAbilities.lore: Patrolling the lands on the outskirts of their domain, these defenders will stop at nothing to see intruders driven back.
regimentAbilities.effect: Friendly units have **WARD (6+)** while they are wholly within friendly territory.

spearheadEnhancements.name: The Wrath of Chotec
spearheadEnhancements.lore: An ancient relic removed from the deepest temple vaults, this gauntlet allows an Oldblood to channel the full might of the Seraphon’s solar god.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: The Attacks characteristic of your general’s **Sunbolt** **Gauntlet** is 6 instead of D6.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Blade of Realities
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Entrusted only to the most formidable Oldbloods, this pan-dimensional weapon exists to bring about the end of tyrants.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of your general’s **Relic** **Celestite Weapon**.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Sotek's Gaze
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The eyes of this gilded war-mask resonate with the pitiless hunger of the Serpent God. With it, the Oldblood brutally cows lesser foes.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Roll a dice. Add the roll to your general’s control score this turn.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Ancient Strategist
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Enemy Movement Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This Oldblood has centuries of experience in commanding their cohorts.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a friendly unit wholly within 12" of your general. You cannot pick your general.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: That unit can use the ‘Normal **Move**’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

artefactsOfPower.name: Bloodrage Pendant
artefactsOfPower.lore: Carved from the bones of savage reptilian megafauna, the Bloodrage Pendant spurs a warrior’s killing rage – all the more should they themselves shed gore.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons. Add 2 instead if the number of damage points allocated to this unit is equal to or greater than half of this unit’s Health characteristic (rounding up).

artefactsOfPower.name: Incandescent Rectrices
artefactsOfPower.lore: This vibrant plumage imbues the bearer with the restorative power of the heavens.

artefactsOfPower.name: Coatl Familiar
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Reaction: You declared a SPELL ability for a friendly SERAPHON WIZARD within this unit’s combat range
artefactsOfPower.lore: Though only a juvenile example of the great feathered serpents, this winged creature is still sacred to the mage-god Tepok.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Add D6 to the casting roll for that **spell**.

heroicTraits.name: Beastmaster
heroicTraits.lore: This mighty leader has a primal dominance over the beasts of the Seraphon hosts, driving them forward to battle.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 2" to the **Move** characteristic of friendly **SERAPHON **CAVALRY**** and **SERAPHON **MONSTER**** units for the rest of the phase if they are wholly within 12" of this unit at the start of the **move**.

heroicTraits.name: Reptilian Cunning
heroicTraits.lore: With cold-blooded calculation, this general looks for opportunities to strike.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit charged this turn, if a friendly unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘All-out **Attack**’ command in the combat phase, no command points are spent.

heroicTraits.name: Being of the Stars
heroicTraits.lore: This hero has a particularly strong connection to their astral heritage, causing their corporeality to wax and wane.
heroicTraits.effect: Ignore modifiers to save rolls for this unit (positive and negative).

abilities.name: Light of Chotec
abilities.lore: The wizard calls upon the sun god Chotec to energise an injured warrior with rays of invigorating solar magics.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **SERAPHON** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of damage points the target has. For each 4+, **Heal (1)** the target.

abilities.name: The Earth Trembles
abilities.lore: With a focused pulse of will, the Starmaster sets the energy of the ley lines spiking until the ground is violently torn asunder.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a point on the battlefield within 18" of them to be the target point, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Draw a straight line between the target point and the closest part on the caster’s base. Roll a D3 for each unit (friendly and enemy) that has models passed across by this line. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Empowered Celestite
abilities.lore: Tapping into the ancient technologies within the weapons of the Coalesced, a light is birthed in each; for a few moments, every strike shatters armour in an explosion of sparks.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **SAURUS** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Mystical Unforging
abilities.lore: The magic of unmaking flies from the wizard’s outstretched hands.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of the target’s weapons until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Speed of Huanchi
abilities.lore: With the grace and momentum of a prowling beast, the allies of the priestly mage are filled with a celestial haste.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **SERAPHON** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the target can use a **RUN** ability and still use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities later in the turn.

abilities.name: Comet's Call
abilities.lore: Their consciousness soaring up to the heavens, the wizard summons a celestial comet that plummets down into the enemy ranks.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Scaly Monstrosities
abilities.lore: The great beasts of the Seraphon are almost invincible when they march forth as a pack.
abilities.effect: Add 2 to the Health characteristic of friendly **SERAPHON MONSTER** units.

abilities.name: Nimble and Quick
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.lore: The skink warriors of a Shadowstrike Starhost outmanoeuvre their enemies at every turn.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **SKINK INFANTRY** or **SKINK CAVALRY** units that are not in combat to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Each target can move D6". Each target cannot move into combat during any part of that move.

abilities.name: Celestial Translocation
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: In a flash of starlight, an Eternal Starhost arrives to enact the will of the Old Ones. Tapping into the celestial power that surrounds the slann, they teleport across the battlefield to catch the foe off guard.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SERAPHON** unit wholly within 12" of a friendly **SERAPHON WIZARD** to use this ability.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Vengeance of Azyr
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: The celestite weapons carried by the warriors of a Sunclaw Starhost are supercharged with the power of Azyr.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **SAURUS** or **KROXIGOR** units that are in combat to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
For each target:

• Make a pile-in move.

• Then, pick an enemy unit in combat with the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.
